jobs.description: Position at an R&D department of a manufacturer of advanced tracking radar systems for sports. My job mostly consists of writing drivers and applications in C++ for Yocto embedded Linux distribution for handling cameras and processing the date that they provide. Another responsibility is developing API to a server based on Python Tornado framework. In the team, we are using continuous integration tools with Microsoft Azure and Robot Framework as a base, so my tasks also involve developing automated tests for the system.

Position at a start-up company developing IoT platform for programming and orchestrating microcontroller-based devices. Job included using ESP32 microcontrollers, testing and utilising newly developed language - Toit, and web development using React, JavaScript and Type Script.
Position of a tester of System Verilog code written for FPGA components of 5G network.
Mechanical engineering internship within the R&D department of an auto cooling systems producer - Valeo.
